content.text: How does Rome Protocol ensure fair MEV?
L2s control their own mempools. Run your own node, control your transaction order. No central MEV extraction. Simple, fair, effective.
What's special about using Solana as sequencer?
3400+ Solana validators securing every L2 transaction. No special nodes needed. Full network security inherited. That's decentralization done right.
Use Solana as shared sequencer = get atomic composability with all L2s + Solana. Trade on one L2, provide liquidity on another, all in one tx.
Testnet is live. Keep testing, keep breaking things. This is how we build robust protocols. More updates coming soon.
